employees.name: Greg Groves
employees.cod: Fell asleep while driving due to not sleeping for 3 days so he could finish a work project
employees.sentence: Sold soul for middle management position

employees.name: Sheila McCarthy
employees.cod: “Accidentally” fell off a mountain during a hike
employees.sentence: Traded soul for 20 years with her ex-husband’s fortune

employees.name: Raymond Dacosta
employees.cod: Heart failure after drinking a red bull everyday for 40 years
employees.sentence: Literally not a soul on earth liked this man

employees.name: Eric Miller
employees.cod: Electrocuted while trying to fix a server with a fork
employees.sentence: Always replied 'did you try restarting it?' to everything

employees.name: Laura Chen
employees.cod: Loudly talking on phone while walking into a manhole
employees.sentence: Sold soul for a lifetime supply of designer hand bags

employees.name: James Wilson
employees.cod: Died of boredom during a 6-hour powerpoint presentation
employees.sentence: Actually enjoyed filling out tax returns

employees.name: Kyle Barker
employees.cod: Spent 48 hours straight gaming without water
employees.sentence: Hated people so much he became a recluse in hell too

employees.name: Patricia Vance
employees.cod: Heart attack during a high-stakes negotiation
employees.sentence: Would sell her own mother for a 5% commission

employees.name: Rafael Gomez
employees.cod: Crushed by a falling filing cabinet
employees.sentence: Once apologized to a door after walking into it

task_templates.title: Fix the Printer
task_templates.description: Repair the infernal printer that melts every hour.

task_templates.title: Eternal Ticket Queue
task_templates.description: Clear tech support tickets that regenerate endlessly.

task_templates.title: Reset Passwords
task_templates.description: Reset every demon's forgotten login credentials.

task_templates.title: Debug Mainframe
task_templates.description: Find the source of screaming errors in the infernal mainframe.

task_templates.title: Reboot Servers
task_templates.description: Manually restart servers scattered across 27 floors.

task_templates.title: Update Software
task_templates.description: Run mandatory updates while demons continue working.

task_templates.title: Repair Laptops
task_templates.description: Fix laptops damaged by brimstone spills.

task_templates.title: Translate Bug Reports
task_templates.description: Interpret vague, unhelpful bug reports.

task_templates.title: Patch Firewall
task_templates.description: Reinforce the actual wall of fire that protects the network.

task_templates.title: Clean Data Spill
task_templates.description: Mop up corrupted information puddles.

task_templates.title: Install Security Updates
task_templates.description: Apply updates rune-by-rune to every device.

task_templates.title: Kindness Training
task_templates.description: Attend an HR seminar on "Nonviolent Communication."

task_templates.title: Investigate Downloads
task_templates.description: Track down who pirated mortal souls on the office Wi-Fi.

task_templates.title: Glitch Gremlin Issue
task_templates.description: Remove the gremlin chewing through cables.

task_templates.title: System Backup
task_templates.description: Back up the system to cursed floppy disks.

task_templates.title: Cold-Call Angry Customers
task_templates.description: Make calls to furious Hell residents demanding refunds.

task_templates.title: Quarterly Report Alone
task_templates.description: Present the sales report without any team support.

task_templates.title: Upsell Useless Product
task_templates.description: Attempt to sell pointless upgrades demons don't need.

task_templates.title: Handle Complaints
task_templates.description: Resolve customer issues without assistance.

task_templates.title: Lead Meeting Unprepared
task_templates.description: Run the sales meeting despite not reviewing the notes.

task_templates.title: Reject Refunds
task_templates.description: Deny all refund requests regardless of merit.

task_templates.title: Solo Networking Event
task_templates.description: Attend a networking mixer alone.

task_templates.title: Host Team-Building
task_templates.description: Lead an activity everyone instantly hates.

task_templates.title: Fire Demon
task_templates.description: Terminate a demon for poor performance.

task_templates.title: Pitch to Execs
task_templates.description: Deliver an improvised pitch to intimidating executives.

task_templates.title: Door-to-Door Surveys
task_templates.description: Survey Hell residents in person.

task_templates.title: Serve VIP Clients
task_templates.description: Handle elite demons who judge everything you do.

task_templates.title: Denial Calls
task_templates.description: Inform clients they did not qualify for service upgrades.

task_templates.title: Peer Feedback
task_templates.description: Give honest performance feedback to a coworker.

task_templates.title: Run Expo Booth Alone
task_templates.description: Operate a promotional booth without team support.

task_templates.title: Mediate Feud
task_templates.description: Stop two demons fighting over office drama.

task_templates.title: Design HR Poster
task_templates.description: Create a cheerful motivational poster from scratch.

task_templates.title: Casual Icebreakers
task_templates.description: Run an informal team bonding session.

task_templates.title: Handle Complaints About Himself
task_templates.description: Address anonymous criticisms sent to HR.

task_templates.title: Resolve Dept Drama
task_templates.description: Untangle chaos between rival departments.

task_templates.title: Exit Interviews
task_templates.description: Interview demons quitting due to workplace misery.

task_templates.title: Creativity Workshop
task_templates.description: Lead a workshop on thinking outside the box.

task_templates.title: Write Praise Notes
task_templates.description: Compose personalized compliments for coworkers.

task_templates.title: Loosen Culture Meeting
task_templates.description: Advise management on making Hell "more fun."

task_templates.title: Role-Play Bonding
task_templates.description: Guide demons through awkward improv games.

task_templates.title: Complaint Against Him
task_templates.description: Meet with HR about a complaint filed by a coworker.

task_templates.title: Brainstorm Session
task_templates.description: Moderate a freeform idea session with no rules.

task_templates.title: Instructionless Form
task_templates.description: Process a form missing all required instructions.

task_templates.title: Office Birthday Party
task_templates.description: Plan a cheerful surprise party.

task_templates.title: Peer Review Circle
task_templates.description: Lead a meeting where demons critique one another.
